title: MvB Fonts
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225024/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225024/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : MvB Fonts**

Founded by [Mark van Bronkhorst](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225024/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mark%20van%20Bronkhorst) as a natural extension to [MvB Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225024/http:/typophile.com/wiki/MvB%20Design), MvB Fonts features work by [Mark van Bronkhorst](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225024/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mark%20van%20Bronkhorst), [Gayle Sato](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225024/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gayle%20Sato), [Akemi Aoki](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225024/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Akemi%20Aoki), [Kanna Aoki](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225024/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Kanna%20Aoki), [Holly Goldsmith](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225024/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Holly%20Goldsmith), [Alan Greene](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225024/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Alan%20Greene), and [Otto Trace](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225024/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Otto%20Trace).

URL: [http://www.mvbfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225024/http:/www.mvbfonts.com/ "http://www.mvbfonts.com")

_1992_

[MVB Magnesium](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225024/http:/typophile.com/wiki/MVB%20Magnesium)

[MVB Greymantle](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225024/http:/typophile.com/wiki/MVB%20Greymantle)

[MVB Peccadillo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225024/http:/typophile.com/wiki/MVB%20Peccadillo)

[MVB Pedestria](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225024/http:/typophile.com/wiki/MVB%20Pedestria)

[MVB Sirenne Six](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225024/http:/typophile.com/wiki/MVB%20Sirenne%20Six)

author: Jared Benson
